In England, in the seven days to 07 March, there were 33,563 new confirmed cases (59.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 February, there were 45,909 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 27% (12,346 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 March is 3,719,272 (6,607.7 cases per 100,000 population).
